article: conagra foods inc. sought to reassure investors thursday that consumer concerns about the company 's microwave popcorn recipe and a salmonella outbreak that took its peter pan peanut butter off the market should not hurt the company 's profit outlook .
abstract: conagra says recent product worries shouldn t hurt profit outlook
